      • getAuditLogsForBundle

        AuditLogsForBundles getAuditLogsForBundle(UUID bundleId,
                                        AuditLevel auditLevel,
                                        TenantContext context)
                                          throws EntitlementRepairException
        Fetch all audit logs for a bundle.
        Parameters:
        bundleId - the bundle id to lookup
        auditLevel - audit level (verbosity)
        context - the tenant context
        Returns:
        all audit logs for these refunds
        Throws:
        EntitlementRepairException
